column2: If any one should wish to get the kingdom for himself, and to effect this by what he does, I see that he will not succeed.
column3: If any one should wish to get the kingdom for himself, and to effect this by what he does, I see that he will not succeed.

column2: The kingdom is a spirit-like thing, and cannot be got by active doing.
column3: The kingdom is a spirit like thing, and cannot be got by active doing.

column2: The second in command of the army has his place on the left; the general commanding in chief has his on the right;--his place, that is, is assigned to him as in the rites of mourning.
column3: The second in command of the army has his place on the left; the general commanding in chief has his on the right;--his place, that is, is assigned to him as in the rites of mourning.
All pervading is the Great Tao!
